page.title: 04Recreation in Newborough.
page.content: Recreational facilities in Newborough itself include darts,snooker,cricket and dancing. A large number of people in Newborough go out of the village to take part in recreational activities outside the home. Husbands interviewed stated that they went to Peterborough to take part in the following activities- cricket,football,darts,golf,athletics, judo,cycling and first aid. Other husbands journeyed to Crowland to participate in bowling,to Bowlsdale to participate in shooting,to Market Deeping for cricket and swimming,and to Whittlesey for weight-lifting. Wives interviewed stated that they went swimming,dancing and gardening in Peterborough.Some went swimming in Market Deeping.
